name: Epilepsy Warning
description:
Epilepsy Warning is so titled to ensure anybody who sufferers from photosensitive conditions will be appropriately warned.  Abuse of the game's primary mechanic can cause a strobing effect, please do not play this game if this could in any way cause you harm.

Tap the screen to change it's colour to red or blue, match the colour of approaching obstacles to survive as long as you can!

This game was completed as part of a 2-hour game development challenge, limited to using only one input!
